Source: Calculated from Kanniyakumari (https://www.irel.co.in/manavalakurichi-mineral-division). Manavalakurichi unit is part of IREL's operations in Tamil Nadu, focusing on beach sand mining

web_search_companies.notes: IREL is a government undertaking under the Department of Atomic Energy, involved in mining and processing of heavy minerals.
